articles.title: Europe's drought exposes ancient stones, World War Two ships as waters fall - Reuters
articles.description: Weeks of baking drought across Europe have seen water levels in rivers and lakes fall to levels few can remember, exposing long-submerged treasures - and some unwanted hazards.
articles.content:
